text:
Is there an issue with Qt5Base_jll on Mac?

```ERROR: LoadError: LoadError: InitError: could not load library "/Users/travis/.julia/artifacts/ee74d003b12e6dd5f748e8cefb1688edbdfb184b/lib/QtConcurrent.framework/Versions/5/QtConcurrent"

text: And kernels not telling you what's the missing library are very helpful

elements.text: And kernels not telling you what's the missing library are very helpful

text: I think this is because the default macOS is too old on Travis, Qt 5.15 needs at least macOS 10.14. <https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/reference/osx/>

elements.text: I think this is because the default macOS is too old on Travis, Qt 5.15 needs at least macOS 10.14.

text: Right, I think you can choose osx version in Travis (but also, Travis?!?!?)

elements.text: Right, I think you can choose osx version in Travis (but also, Travis?!?!?)

text: yep, the link above explains how to change the macOS version

elements.text: yep, the link above explains how to change the macOS version
